message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that $120 is a great price, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. It's a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $125.
I understand that $125 is a good compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $127. It's still a fair price considering the product's value and quality.
I'm sticking with my previous offer of $125. I think that's a fair price.
I understand that you're sticking to your offer, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $126. It's still a great deal for both of us!
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not willing to go above $125. I'd be happy to make a deal at that price.

I understand that you're firm on the price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to give up yet. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $124. It's the lowest price I'm willing to accept.
I appreciate your concessions, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $120. That's my final offer.
